item.title: Create and schedule jobs with JobRunr using only a Java lambda
item.description: In this guide, we will learn how to: setup JobRunr learn how to enqueue and schedule a job in vanilla Java or your favorite web framework using only a Java 8 lambda monitor your jobs using the built-in dashboard What is JobRunr Introduction JobRunr is a library that we can embed in our application and which allows us to schedule background jobs using a Java 8 lambda. We can use any existing method of our Spring services to create a job without the need to implement an interface.
